tag_list: product-marketing, web-merchandising, e-commerce, electronic-marketing, email-marketing, website-hosting, forecasting, subscription-modeling, competitive-analysis, contact-center-management, telesales, analysis, customer-relations, market-research, sales
overview:
Jeremy Pallai is an experienced product marketing professional living in Boston, MA. Jeremy is currently managing Vistaprint’s website hosting and email marketing businesses. Product Marketing teams at VistaPrint set the global product portfolio strategy and execute against that strategy. Acting as general managers of a product category, the teams are responsible for new product development, management of the existing portfolio, and product forecasting.

Jeremy Pallai’s Specialties:

product marketing, web merchandising, e-commerce, electronic marketing, email marketing, website hosting, forecasting, subscription modeling, competitive analysis, contact center management, telesales, analysis, customer relations, market research, sales, product management, product development, people management
